title: Milk Washing (Clarification)
technical_notes: Use Whole Milk (fat is key). Ratio 4:1 (Spirit Mix : Milk). Add Acidified Spirit TO Milk (not vice-versa) to control curdling speed. Filter through coffee filter twice for crystal clarity.

title: Fat Washing
technical_notes: Combine liquid fat (butter/oil) with spirit. Freeze overnight. Fat solidifies at top, remove solid puck. Spirit retains flavor and silky texture but no grease.

title: Citric Acid Solution
technical_notes: Dissolve 6g Citric Acid powder in 100ml water to mimic Lemon Juice acidity without flavor/perishability. Use Malic Acid for Lime profile.

title: Super Juice (Oleosaccharum Extraction)
technical_notes: Peel citrus. Macerate peels in Citric/Malic acid for 1 hour to extract oils. Blend with water and juice of the fruit. Yields 8x more juice than squeezing alone.

title: Ice Dilution Thermodynamics
technical_notes: Shaking: Adds ~25-30% water volume. Equilibrium temp -2C to -5C. Stirring: Adds ~15-20% water. Equilibrium temp 0C to -2C. Surface area of ice dictates speed of cooling.

title: Saline Solution
technical_notes: 20% Saline Solution (20g Salt / 80g Water). Use 2-3 drops in citrus drinks to suppress bitterness and pop citrus notes. Essential for Espresso Martinis.
